How are bodhisattvas able to abandon evil and seek offerings? Good sons! Bodhisattvas

This is called a bodhisattva abandoning evil and seeking offerings.

It means that this bodhisattva does not engage in deception to obtain offerings, does not cheat with weights and measures, never takes advantage of what is entrusted to him, and does not engage in deception.
